post.body: Sheesh! Apparently I'm Web Challenged. Here's the link: http://www.credomobile.com/
Thank you Cody. :)
I guess I could include the link: www.credo.com.
mobile phone company that gives a percentage to causes that "members" (customers) choose
I nominate @sockington for a Shorty Award in #humor because SOCKS ARMY REPRESENT
Credo Mobile
I do! Always feel like checkers are giving me guilt looks when I say "no." Same thing w/ homeless guy outside grocery s ...
And change will be possible again when they realize the first change didn't 'take'!
Oy vey. LOL
Everyone should follow @CodyJackson cuz he's funny yet lonely in Twitterville.
The first person I followed on Twitter was @brandonmuth. http://tinyurl.com/9cflat #firstfollow
Is it inappropriate to like one client more than all the rest??? And no, I'll never tell.
I thought Bristol was the silliest name ever until I heard of Tripp. (Make sure you pronounce with two Ps.)
A few more hours and then home to do laundry so I have clothes to take to Tahoe. Ha!
Happy - one of my teammates brought me a mini-bucket of yummy cookies. Alas, my trainer will not be happy. But he doesn't need to know.
Beautiful day in SF - getting ready to throw a big dinner party tonight
She needs to be spayed: http://news.yahoo.com/s/ap/18th_baby
Helping a colleague do some training today, should be fun. Coffee, first though.
This is a good read: http://tinyurl.com/3vpuoe
Retweeting @Ronjini: When you're bored and worried about identity theft: www.santafraud.com
